shallow_depth.explain: Elbows do not reach a deep bend at the bottom. Aim to lower until upper arms are roughly parallel to the floor.
drills: Elevated hands push-ups focusing on depth 3x8

no_lockout.explain: Elbows are not fully extended at the top. Finish each rep with a strong lockout and protraction.

hip_sag.explain: Hips drop below the shoulder-ankle line, indicating bracing loss.

hips_piking.explain: Hips lift above the shoulder-ankle line, shifting load to the shoulders.
drills: Incline push-ups with tight body line 3x8
